readable.title: 2419186511_f0ce5f9685
readable.content: A baby is taking a bath in a bowl full of water . a baby who is sticking out its tongue is being held inside a bowl of water . A cute baby takes a bath in a large clear bowl . A little baby is taking a bath in a large Tupperware bowl filled with water . A smiling baby is sitting in a large plastic tub of water .
